mapper.select:
SELECT hws.server_id, hws.webhook_address, hws.server_type, hws.enabled_flag, hts.message_code as messageCode, hts.message_name as messageName, hts.temp_server_id as tempServerId FROM hmsg_webhook_server hws INNER JOIN hmsg_template_server_wh htsh ON htsh.server_code = hws.server_code INNER JOIN hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.temp_server_id = htsh.temp_server_id AND ( htsl.template_code LIKE '%JSON%' OR htsl.template_code LIKE '%DingTalkAndWeChat%' ) INNER JOIN hmsg_template_server hts ON hts.temp_server_id = htsl.temp_server_id
INNER JOIN webhook_project_rel wpr on wpr.project_id=#{projectId} and wpr.webhook_id=hws.server_id
where hws.tenant_id=#{tenantId}
AND hts.message_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{messageName}),'%')
AND hws.type=#{type}
AND hws.enabled_flag='enableFlag'
AND (hws.webhook_address like concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') or hts.message_name like concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%'))
mapper.delete: DELETE hws.*, hwsl.*, htsl.*,hwsh.* FROM hmsg_webhook_server hws JOIN hmsg_webhook_server_tl hwsl ON hwsl.server_id = hws.server_id JOIN hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.server_code = hws.server_code LEFT JOIN webhook_project_rel wpr on wpr.webhook_id=hws.server_id JOIN hmsg_template_server_wh hwsh on hwsh.server_code=hws.server_code WHERE hws.server_id=#{webhookId}
